entity.name: Melania Trump
entity.description: Former US First Lady Melania Trump

text: @realDonaldTrump You selfish stupid shitpile. I should not be shocked that you came from a Covid19 +  environment  - without a mask, to an event honoring people in their 90s. You and Melania,  who actually wore a mask a week ago. To put these heroes at risk, is beyond evil.
